General.Name: Rajshree Sugars & Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Rajshree Sugars and Chemicals Limited engages in the sugar, power, distillery, and biotechnology businesses in India. The company operates through three segments: Sugar, Cogeneration, and Distillery. It provides white crystal sugar, demerara sugar, white sugar sachets, and demerara sugar sachets. The company also offers distillery products, such as rectified spirit, anhydrous alcohol, and extra neutral alcohol; and organic manure. In addition, it generates power through cogeneration plants. Rajshree Sugars and Chemicals Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
